title: Konoshima

description: twilight scene of a lake and mountains: at left, a silhouette of a boat with 2 sails and 2 human figures; in center, a silhouette of a steamship with glowing orange windows; lights from ship and along shore are reflected in the water
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
